attributes.review: this app is awful, once i downloaded it: i got a. mysterious knock on my door. when i opened the door, donald j. trump (the j stands for jews) was standing there. he then proceeded to skin me alive!! he kidnapped my family while i was dead on the floor :(( luckily i respawned, but my respawn point was set to my friends house!! i had to walk all the wall back to my house to see trump dragging my parents and sister!! he was really slow so i managed to help them escape! unless you want this happening to you DONT get this app ❤️❤️
attributes.title: poo poo

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to ❤️support❤️ the president but i opened the app to see a fat ~cheeto~. it had oompa loompa like features and reminded me of martha. i clicked and saw a chicken 🐔wing🍗chicken🐔wing🍗. this caused💫cardiac arrest💫. i was hypertensive and had an aneurysm that resulted in an ablation. when leaving the ✨hospital✨i saw a trump 2020 flag which caused an episode of 🍊PTSD🍊. i soon after fell down a deep rabbit hole that sent me to 🔥hell🔥. i found out 🐰rabbits🐰actually live there. i had bbq wings and was transported out. i now have ✨severe✨ PTSD and a transplanted heart. TRUMP 2020.
attributes.title: 🍊orange🍊

attributes.review: I opened the app and since he be kicking us out I was kicked so now I played caillou and and caillou didn’t like me anymore because of Donald trump he said he hates me so now caillou likes Donald trump now bill bye was making science stuff and he said he was won’t let caillou like Donald trump and then when I opened the app again I saw what he was going to do OMG HE BOUGHT HIS VOTES like dang never knew that so then I called my girl Dora the explorer and then we created tiktoks then I went on the app again and it crashed
attributes.title: Eww

attributes.review: we’re playing ur game now trump. and we will win. if you’re going to take away our app we SURE as HELL gonna take away yours. you should be scared of gen z because we don’t sand for injustice, we don’t stand for racist, homophobic, misogynistic presidents who run our country with stupidity. so in conclusion i’d like to thank you for your 4 years as president, you truly showed gen z our power and our ability to rattle THE PRESIDENT, and we will never be the same.
attributes.title: i found this app to be scary and offensive.

attributes.review: I understand why there are so many one-star reviews for this app. I tried to download it only for the download process to fail multiple times and I had to keep deleting it a re-downloading, even though I was on my house wifi. Once the app was finally downloaded, I tried to use it and it just kept closing me out, almost like my phone was rejecting the app in all of its undeniable stupidity. I couldn't use the app once.
attributes.title: this app was terrible

attributes.review: It took five whole days to download! Not one or two but FIVE WHOLE days to download! Naturally after waiting for soooo long I thought the app would be worth it but nooooooooo! I was clearly very wrong because as soon as I opened the app my phone SHUT DOWN! I had to spend 50$ on trying to fix it, but finally it unlocked. But when it did open the only app I had left was the stupid trump app! It ERASED Alllllllll of My DATA. This it completely unacceptable 😤😤😤😞☹️😡😡😡🤯🤬😑👿😿😾
attributes.title: The absolute WORST app ever

attributes.review: so i was just trying to support our dear orange and the app made my whole phone crash, so then i dropped my phone the bath tub because it was so hot, it was charging too mind u, and THE ELECTRIC SHOCK WENT ALL THE WAY TO MY UTERUS AND MURDERED MY BABY!!!! unfortunately i am still alive but this app is obviously pro-choice because i am clearly pro-life. i don’t even know if i can vote for our orange now if his app is supporting pro-choice ideas. anyways- go trump! go pro life! go pro death penalty! go white supremacy! ban tiktok 2020!
attributes.title: this app caused my miscarriage😭😵

attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I saw it was trending I have no idea who this man is but he keeps looking at me weird and this app is starting to make my phone smell bad. I know it sounds crazy and I have never heard of this before or experienced this smell coming from my phone. After only a day or so the smell was starting to leak more out of my phone. It almost smelled like money and an orange but if you take another whiff it smelled like racism and corruption. Would not recommend!!
attributes.title: Who

attributes.review: After reading all of the reviews I was skeptical to get the app, however I decided to try it out. That long download time was true, I waited almost a day, but I was one of the luck ones with the shorter of the download times. Once I opened the app it asked for so much of my personal information so I decided on not going further! This especially because some people’s information has been hacked from this app; so no thank you!!!
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: So I’m a time traveler and I wanted to experience 2020 in its fullest. 2020 is historically the worst year of the 21st century, but the silver lining is that the USA did not elect the Cheet0 man for a second term. I downloaded this app to write an accurate report of how life was in this year. After I entered my phone number I received multiple spam texts that mostly related to p0rn. I knew he was tra$h but I didn’t know how bad it actually was. Keep your head up people, things will get better.
attributes.title: Message from the future
